title: Managing water scarcity with better data | Hong Yang

tasks.task: Present an idea for managing water scarcity to enhance food security in sub-Saharan Africa.
subtasks: Explain the increasing global population and its impact on food and water needs.
Statistic: Approximately 70% of withdrawn water resources are used for irrigation.
Highlight the challenge of producing more food with limited water resources.
Discuss the role of international trade in virtual water and its significance for regions like North America and South America.

Highlight maize yield in sub-Saharan Africa being one-third of the global average.
Discuss factors affecting yield growth in sub-Saharan Africa using crop models and GIS.
